mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice ( notice_no, emp_no, notice_title, notice_content, category, notice_hit, notice_pin, pin_start, pin_end, reg_date, mod_date ) VALUES ( notice_pk_seq.nextval, 1004, #{notice_title}, #{notice_content}, '카테고리', 1, #{notice_pin}, '2024-01-01', '2024-01-01', TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') )
mapper.update: update notice set notice_title = #{notice_title}, notice_content = #{notice_content}, notice_pin = #{notice_pin}, mod_date= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') where notice_no = #{notice_no}
